Key Match Events: The Braves won the first game of the series 12-0
Pre-Game Insights: The Nationals have a strong record when they out-hit their opponents (48-12)
The Braves are effective without giving up home runs (50-14 in games without HRs)
The series is the 13th meeting this season, with the Nationals leading 7-5
Post-Match Reflections: The Braves won the first game, setting up a potential sweep
Miscellaneous Highlights: Marcell Ozuna leads the Braves with 65 extra base hits
C.J. Abrams has 26 doubles, six triples, 19 home runs, and 64 RBI for the Nationals
Others: Several players are on the injured list for both teams
The game is being played at Nationals Park in Washington
